title: (x) Cannot remember what font I used / bold serif - (similar to) Skolar {Akos P}
content:
In this logo test:  
 [http://avidos.net/muselius.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140304210129/http:/avidos.net/muselius.png "http://avidos.net/muselius.png")

Thanks for your help!
author: missha

comments.content:
I would guess a lighter weight (Semibold), but I think Skolar is the right answer.

- Mike Yanega

Yes, it is the best typeface in the world: [http://type-together.com/Skolar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140304210129/http:/type-together.com/Skolar "http://type-together.com/Skolar")  
… but honestly, it could be Malaga as well. This sample is quite small to tell them apart.  
Hm. if I may make an unbiased suggestion, use Skolar. :)

@Mike: You might be right.  
@David: Looks like it's meet the author day :) And a fellow Central-European as well! Congratulations, by the way, it's a lovely face.
